languages.text: "О святый {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бог-Император{/g}..." {n}Абеляр хватается за лоб, на его лице на мгновение появляется выражение полной растерянности — которая, впрочем, сменяется решимостью.{/n} "Полагаю, к восстанию на корабле причастен именно он? И, госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}, хотел бы напомнить, что для вас Лорд-капитан — Леди Теодора".

traits.locale_text: "О святый {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бог-Император{/g}..." {n}Абеляр хватается за лоб, на его лице на мгновение появляется выражение полной растерянности — которая, впрочем, сменяется решимостью.{/n} "Полагаю, к восстанию на корабле причастен именно он? И, госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}, хотел бы напомнить, что для вас Лорд-капитан — Леди Теодора".

languages.text: "Oh, Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"
languages.original_text: "О святый {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бог-Император{/g}..." {n}Абеляр хватается за лоб, на его лице на мгновение появляется выражение полной растерянности — которая, впрочем, сменяется решимостью.{/n} "Полагаю, к восстанию на корабле причастен именно он? И, госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}, хотел бы напомнить, что для вас Лорд-капитан — Леди Теодора".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly find his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly find his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

"Oh, Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

languages.text: “噢，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}在上啊……”{n}阿贝拉德抚额长叹。有那么一瞬间，他看起来手足无措，但很快他就重新恢复了镇定。{/n}“我猜，他就是这场叛乱的幕后黑手吧？还有，{name}大人，我想提醒您。当您称呼舰长大人时，请称呼她为‘西奥多拉夫人’。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

traits.locale_text: “噢，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}在上啊……”{n}阿贝拉德抚额长叹。有那么一瞬间，他看起来手足无措，但很快他就重新恢复了镇定。{/n}“我猜，他就是这场叛乱的幕后黑手吧？还有，{name}大人，我想提醒您。当您称呼舰长大人时，请称呼她为‘西奥多拉夫人’。”

languages.text: «Oh, santo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}...». {n}Abelard se lleva las manos a la frente. Durante un brevísimo instante, parece haber abandonado, pero recupera rápidamente la determinación.{/n} «¿Asumo que también es responsable del motín? Y, maestr{mf|o|a} {name}, le recuerdo que debe referirse a la Lord Capitán como "lady Theodora"».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, santo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}...». {n}Abelard se lleva las manos a la frente. Durante un brevísimo instante, parece haber abandonado, pero recupera rápidamente la determinación.{/n} «¿Asumo que también es responsable del motín? Y, maestr{mf|o|a} {name}, le recuerdo que debe referirse a la Lord Capitán como "lady Theodora"».

languages.text: 「ああ、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}…」{n}アベラルドは額を押さえた。ほんの一瞬迷ったように見えたがすぐに再び決意を固める。{/n}「彼が反乱の首謀者ということでしょうか？それから、{name}様、ロード・キャプテンを『シオドーラ様』と呼ぶことをお忘れなく」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}聖なる神帝陛下{/g}…」{n}アベラルドは額を押さえた。彼はほんの一瞬迷ったように見えたがすぐに再び決意を固める。{/n} 「彼が反乱の首謀者だと思う。それから, {mf|マスター|ミストレス} {name}、ロード・キャプテンを『レディ・テオドラ』と呼ぶことをお忘れなく」
「ああ、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}…」{n}アベラルドは額を押さえた。ほんの一瞬迷ったように見えたがすぐに再び決意を固める。{/n}「彼が反乱の首謀者ということでしょうか？それから、{name}様、ロード・キャプテンを『シオドーラ様』と呼ぶことをお忘れなく」

languages.text: « Oh, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} tout-puissant... » {n}Abélard se tient la tête à deux mains. Pendant un bref instant, il semble perdu, mais sa détermination lui revient très vite.{/n} « J'imagine que c'est lui qui a provoqué la mutinerie ? Au fait, {mf|maître|maîtresse} {name}, je vous saurais gré de bien vouloir appeler la seigneure-capitaine "dame Théodora". »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} tout-puissant... » {n}Abélard se tient la tête à deux mains. Pendant un bref instant, il semble perdu, mais sa détermination lui revient très vite.{/n} « J'imagine que c'est lui qui a provoqué la mutinerie ? Au fait, {mf|maître|maîtresse} {name}, je vous saurais gré de bien vouloir appeler la seigneure-capitaine "dame Théodora". »

languages.text: "Oh, heiliger {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} ..." {n}Abelard greift sich an die Stirn. Für einen Augenblick wirkt er verloren, aber sofort fasst er sich wieder.{/n} "Dann ist er wohl auch verantwortlich für die Meuterei? Und, {mf|Herr|Herrin} {name}, ich darf Euch daran erinnern, dass Ihr vom Lord Captain als 'Lady Theodora' zu sprechen habt."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, heiliger {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} ..." {n}Abelard greift sich an die Stirn. Für einen Augenblick wirkt er verloren, aber sofort fasst er sich wieder.{/n} "Dann ist er wohl auch verantwortlich für die Meuterei? Und, {mf|Herr|Herrin} {name}, ich darf Euch daran erinnern, dass Ihr vom Lord Captain als 'Lady Theodora' zu sprechen habt."

languages.original_text: "Oh, Holy God-Emperor..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} , I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

languages.text: "Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g} aşkına!" {n}Abelard alnını avuçluyor. Bir anlığına kendini kaybetmiş bir görüntü sergilese de hızla toparlanıyor.{/n} "Bu durumda isyanın sorumlusu da o galiba? Ayrıca {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, hatırlatmak isterim ki Lord Kaptan'a 'Leydi Theodora' şeklinde hitap etmelisiniz."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Holy {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}..." {n}Abelard clutches his forehead. He looks lost for the briefest of moments, but then quickly finds his resolve again.{/n} "I presume he is the one responsible for the mutiny? And, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, I wish to remind you that you are to refer to the Lord Captain as 'Lady Theodora.'"

Bir anlığına kendini kaybetmiş bir görüntü sergilese de hızla toparlanıyor.{/n} "Bu durumda isyanın sorumlusu da o galiba? Ayrıca {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, hatırlatmak isterim ki Lord Kaptan'a 'Leydi Theodora' şeklinde hitap etmelisiniz."
